description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: SELECT last("diskStatus") FROM "diskTable" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "diskID"
SELECT last("usersSSH") AS "SSH", last("usersHTTP") AS "HTTP", last("usersSFTP") AS "SFTP" FROM "snmp.SYNO" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.86.149') AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /md[2-3]$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  "name" =~ /md[2-3]$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /md[2-3]$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /md[2-3]$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '0d42d827caee' AND "name" = 'md2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" = '0d42d827caee' AND "name" = 'md2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)

list.label: Syno:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.SYNO" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/

list.label: Appname
list.name: appname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=appname

list.label: LogHostname
list.name: logHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=hostname

list.label: Severity
list.name: severity
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=severity

list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name"

title: Synology DashBoard
